content: Explore codebase structure (backend/frontend files, existing docs, configs)
Write comprehensive README.md with project overview and quick start
Write /docs/API.md - complete API endpoint reference with examples
Create install.sh - automated one-command installation script
Final review and verification of all documentation
Improve install.sh with better error handling, validation, and user-friendliness
Test installation script components and add progress indicators
Fix critical bug: Replace all 'inactive' with 'disconnected' in server.py
Fix critical bug: Replace all 'hospital_visit' with 'accident_illness' in server.py
Add phone number normalization for User model (WhatsApp digest bug)
Update documentation to reflect enum changes
